item.title: Birth of Cryptography 700 BCE
item.description: Security is must in modern computing. However, many people donâ€™t know that it was originated thousands of years ago in the Roman Empire.

item.title: The First Computer 2500 BCE
item.description: The abacus is the first instrument designed for computation. It made easy for people to calculate numbers and measurements. It could perform basic arithmetic operations and was the world’s first tabulation machine.
